name: NFTcard_006///jaodasartes
description:
Collection of cards about the artists and the works in our NFT art collections, created to disseminate the work of artists in the NFTcommunity of Tezos blockchain.

Each cards contains the artist's nickname, his twitter username, a work with his title and #OBJKT, the profile that the artist has on his twitter or website, the most relevant tags used in his artworks, number of creations and number of collectors who own their work, finally there are some values ​​that we have created and they are the following:

The value in the upper left corner is called ENERGY (monthly average of works minted)

The value in the heart called the POWER of LOVE (collections / creations)

The value next to the Tezos symbol is the CREATIONS SOLD according to the information in hic.af

An amount equal to the twitter followers that the artist has at the time of publication will be minted. This first collection of 33 different artists can be collected for the same value until they are finished (0.033 $XTZ)

The resources obtained will be to collect more NFTs and continue with more NFTcards. 10% of the editions will be reserved to give to the NFTcommunity and promote arts.
